dmca.title: Misappropriated Third Party Data
dmca.body:
It has come to our attention (through the use of unique identifiers) that you are again misappropriating data from a third party's Trackmaster account. Any and all data supplied to that third party is for that party's use only; no additional use is permitted to third parties. Your use of the misappropriated data in the production of reports on the web site is a violation of AXIS' legal rights.

As our records do not indicate that you have received the necessary license from AXZCIS, we believe you are wilfully infringing our rights under federal and state law and could be liable for statutory damages.

AXCIS hereby demands that you immediately cease the publication and dessemination of the misappropriated data. AXCIS also demands that you desist from this and any other infringement of our rights in the future. If we have not received an affirmative response from you by April 15, 2006 indicating that you are fully complied with these requirements, we shall be forced to take further action against you.
